Class StudentUI

java.lang.Object
StudentUI
public class StudentUI extends Object
Displays the main student UI in order to perform the student function.

  • Method Details

    • start

      public void start(Scanner sc, StudentDbMgr studentDbMgr)
      Method to start and run the main student ui class.

    • login

      public Student login(Scanner sc, StudentDbMgr studentDbMgr)
      Prompts user to enter their user name and password and verify it. Display the respective success and failure outcomes.
      Parameters:
      sc - shared Scanner for user input
      Returns:
      true if validation successful, otherwise return false.

    • menu

      public int menu(Scanner sc)
      Displays the student main menu options and takes in the user inputs. Repeatedly prompts user to enter the correct input.
      Parameters:
      sc - shared Scanner for user input
      Returns:
      the value of that user input.

    • viewOpportunities

      public void viewOpportunities(InternshipUI internshipUI, Student student)
      Display all internship opportunity that is given to that particular student
      Parameters:
      internshipUI - helper function to display internships
      student - student for whom internships are shown

    • applyForInternship

      public void applyForInternship(Scanner sc, InternshipDbMgr internshipDbMgr, Student student)
      Display process for applying internships.
      Parameters:
      sc - shared Scanner for user input
      internshipDbMgr - database manager used to retrieve internship
      student - student applying for internship

    • viewAppliedInternships

      public void viewAppliedInternships(StudentDisplay studentDisplay, Student student)
      View applied internship for that student.
      Parameters:
      studentDisplay - helper to display applied internships
      student - student whom applied internship will be displayed

    • acceptInternship

      public void acceptInternship(Scanner sc, StudentDisplay studentDisplay, Student student)
      Display process for accepting internship.
      Parameters:
      sc - shared Scanner for user input
      studentDisplay - helper to display the applied internships
      student - student accepting internship

    • requestWithdrawal

      public void requestWithdrawal(Scanner sc, InternshipDbMgr internshipDbMgr, Student student)
      Display process for withdrawing from internship after it has been accepted.
      Parameters:
      sc - shared Scanner for user input
      internshipDbMgr - database manager used to retrieve internships
      student - student who requesting the withdrawal

    • changePassword

      public void changePassword(Student student, Scanner sc, StudentPasswordMgr studentPasswordMgr)
      Display process for changing password.
      Parameters:
      student - student whose password will be changed
      sc - shared Scanner for user input
      studentPasswordMgr - manager used to perform operations.
